title: Kid Colt Outlaw
additional-notes: A note in the January-June 1976 Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the May 1949 issue, and was filed in December 1976.

Number 5 is the first issue to have 'Kid Colt Outlaw' both on the cover and in the issue indicia.  Numbers 3 and 4 of the predecessor title 'Kid Colt' also had 'Kid Colt Outlaw' on the cover.  (Their issue renewals are noted in the record for Kid Colt.)
